tasks.text: Improving an existing quality control tool which is being used by back-office users of a stock exchange and financial information company. This tool validates the data coming from various sources and generates alerts if data doesn’t meet the criteria defined in the algorithms.
Redux for SPA development.  Developing responsive application that can be served to Desktop Tablet and Mobile users using ReactJs.
Maintaining states in the stores and dispatched the actions using Redux.
Upgrading entire application’s UI library (Element Framework) from old version to latest version.
Interacting with Testing team, Scrum Master and Business Analysts for fixing the issues.
Performing system testing for complete UI after fixing the issues which were reported by testing team.
Following an Agile development process for change delivery.
